definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: The utility of this rescue equipment has still to be assessed in a real emergency.
sentences.chinese: 这种救生设备的功用还有待在真正的紧急情况中评定。

sentences.english: But it was the British scientist Sir John Ambrose Fleming who was to discover it's full potential.
sentences.chinese: 不过是英国科学家佛来明，发现了它的功用。

sentences.english: Even a photograph of their loved one is enough to have an effect.
sentences.chinese: 即便是一张爱人的照片，也能有所功用。

sentences.english: Currently DMAE has been found to have many benefits.
sentences.chinese: 目前已发现DMAE有许多功用。

sentences.english: It is an attempt to rejoin its sign function;
sentences.chinese: 这是一个企图，要重新加入它的符号的功用。

sentences.english: Flourishing, however, is a functional definition.
sentences.chinese: 然而，富足是一个功用性质的定义。

sentences.english: Why Read the Puritans Today?" by Rev. Don Kistler".
sentences.chinese: 一本用清教徒神学来看律法功用的好书。

sentences.english: That car wreck goes to show what wreckless driving can do.
sentences.chinese: 那辆车的残骸更说明了没有损坏的车的功用。

sentences.english: Right now the Oyster Card is only used on public transport and there is little Internet functionality available.
sentences.chinese: 现在，牡蛎卡只用于公共交通，其网络功用几乎为零。

sentences.english: He also puts great emphasis on educational function of literature.
sentences.chinese: 他在用世思想作用下，格外强调文学的政教功用。

sentences.english: This function is defined by a point-by-point correspondence of two unities in space.
sentences.chinese: 这种功用被定义为空间的两个一致实体点对点的对应。

sentences.english: The third chapter talks about the social functions of euphemism from the angle of pragmatics.
sentences.chinese: 第三章从语用的角度分析了委婉语的社会功用。

sentences.english: Furthermore, since the rectangular one represents the fundamental quality, it also needs to be close to the functions.
sentences.chinese: 并且由于矩形代表本质，所以也需要紧连著功用。

sentences.english: To which church family will you be joined as a functioning member?
sentences.chinese: 你要加入哪个教会家庭作一个有功用的成员？

sentences.english: This also had a cultic function as well.
Brush Tung Oil on the paper to make it water resistant.
sentences.chinese: 伞面棉纸上桐油，具有防水及强化伞面的功用。

definition: to act on/to affect/action/function/activity/impact/result/effect/purpose/intent/to play a role/corresponds to English -ity, -ism, -ization/CL:個|个[ge4]
to detoxify/to relieve fever (in Chinese medicine)
to share/to use in common/suitable/fit for purpose/useable
conversant with the Confucian classics/to stimulate menstrual flow (TCM)
